segments.text: I see the woman facing away, towel on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sink’s full, water spilling over the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming wide on the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot’s touching it, but she continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly to her side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the two-step stool, hand in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool legs splayed, not steady at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate too, balancing act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, palm open toward the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinet doors swung wide open above.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window shows bushes and a path outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s sad the mom misses all this trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup feels off, like trouble brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR
